Description: Turquoise blue glazed composition rectangular bead, corners rounded off, front and back decorated with incised and intersecting diagonal lines, pierced longitudinally, glaze worn and chipped around perforation.
Curator's comments: Xia type PD16/65. Xia, N. 2014, Ancient Egyptian Beads, Heidelberg.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (QG.04)
